ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dark Age of Camelot
ygData.msgSnippet: Egad!  I sure hope not.  WoTC has dropped the ball on everything they have acquired thus far I think, with the possible exception of TSR.  They had all the
ygData.messageBody:
Egad! I sure hope not. WoTC has dropped the ball on everything they have
acquired thus far I think, with the possible exception of TSR. They had all
the proprietary licenses revoked when they acquired Last Unicorn games,
effectively rendering everything LU did dead as of the end of the year.

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2000 1:31 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dark Age of Camelot


At 12:57 PM 11/15/00 -0700, you wrote:
>Even more fortunately, it's not like there will be anyone at ICE in a
>position to legally object if their new system is awfully close to
>Rolemaster.

ICE will be bought up by someone else (possibly WOTC), so don't count on
that. It's good to hear that Mythic was on the ball, though. I may look
into that one after all.

Talies



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
